featureType.name: global_analysis_DINuptake_seaweeds
featureType.title: Global metaanalysis of dissolved inorganic nitrogen uptake by seaweeds
featureType.abstract: This dataset compiles data from 84 published studies on nitrate (NO₃⁻) and ammonium (NH₄⁺) uptake kinetics in marine macroalgae. Studies were identified through Google Scholar and Web of Science searches and include all research reporting Michaelis–Menten parameters (Vmax and Ks/Km), linear uptake slopes, or biphasic uptake patterns. For each study, taxonomic information, functional group, habitat of origin, season of collection, and experimental conditions, and presence and concentration of other macronutrients was recorded. Each record includes an approximate geographic location and the full study reference.
